$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/02
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.author: oeyoews
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text:
> 向button 添加 tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink 两个 class, 可以使得按钮看起来像一个内部链接。

<<random-author>>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/docs/cn-tw
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.author: oeyoews
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text:
> 看不懂`tiddlywiki`的英文文档? 不用担心，[[cn document|https://bramchen.github.io/tw5-docs/zh-Hans]] 这里有实时更新的中文版`tiddlywiki`文档

<<random-author>>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/docs/descripte-tw
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.author: oeyoews
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text:
> 简单来说，Tiddlywiki 就是一个简单的可以直接在浏览器编辑的html文件.

<<random-author>>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/01
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.author: oeyoews
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text:
@@color: red;font-style: bold; * [[random-tip|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Fkiasu%2FRandomTiddlerButton]] 需要有关Tiddlywiki的使用技巧,经验等素材，欢迎提供 [[@oeyoews|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw]], 如果对于此插件有更好的建议, 欢迎提供. * ps: tiddlywiki的中文翻译官网是一个不错的素材网站. @@
Random Tip Plugin have <$count filter=[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[Tiddlywiki5Tip]] /> tips

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/docs/new-journal
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.author: oeyoews
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text:
> 按住 alt j 即可快速创建当天日记.

<<random-author>>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/docs/use-cn
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.author: oeyoews
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text:
> 英文版的 tiddlywiki 不会用？ 你可以直接下载中文版的tiddlywiki

<<random-author>>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/docs/use-markdown
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.subtitle: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.author: oeyoews
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text:
> 如果你不能马上适应tiddlywiki的wikitext语法， 你还可以安装markdown插件, 从而在tiddlywiki里面使用markdown语法.

<<random-author>>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/ui/add-new-random-tip
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.caption: {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/icon}} random tips
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip.text: \whitespace trim <$button message="add new random tip" tooltip="" aria-label="" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/icon}} <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/empty-template" title=<> tags="Tiddlywiki5Tip"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="add new random tip"/>

/home/oeyoews/REPOS/neotw/dev/plugins/ti.title: /home/oeyoews/REPOS/neotw/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-random-tip/tiddlers/ui/random-tip.tid
/home/oeyoews/REPOS/neotw/dev/plugins/ti.caption: show random tip
/home/oeyoews/REPOS/neotw/dev/plugins/ti.text: \whitespace trim \define random-action(link) <$action-navigate $to="$link$" /> \end <$button tooltip={{}} aria-label={{}} class=<> > <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$macrocall $name="random-action" link={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[Tiddlywiki5Tip]random[1]] }}} /> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/lightbump}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{xxx}}/>
